<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<?mSeries schema="Android_DetailScreen_v7_004"?>
<Screen
  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
  xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="../../../../XSD/Android_DetailScreen_v7_004.xsd"
  platform="ANDROID"
  type="DETAIL"
  code="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader"
  beforeLoad="beforeLoad"
  beforeUnload="beforeUnload"
  afterDataLoad="afterDataLoad"
  onDataChange="onDataChange"
  onActivate="onActivate"
  >
	<TitleBar>
		<Left>
			<BackButton/>
		</Left>
		<Right>
			<ActionButtons>
				<ActionButton title="getTranslation(Apps_abtnActions)">
					<Actions>
						<Action title="getTranslation(Apps_abtnFinalizePayment)" onTap="onTapBtnFinalize" />
					</Actions>
				</ActionButton>
			</ActionButtons>
		</Right>
	</TitleBar>
	<SelectCommands>
		<SelectCommand code="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_Sel" >
			<FileSource  name="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_Sel.SQL"/>
		</SelectCommand>
		<SelectCommand>
			<FileSource code="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_ImageSel" name="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_ImageSel.sql"/>
		</SelectCommand>
	</SelectCommands>
	<ScreenComponents>
		<CellGroup code="clgPaymentInfo">
			<Header title="getTranslation(Apps_hdrPaymentInfo)"/>
			<Cells>
				<Cell format="Outer_1" code="cllPaymentCode">
					<Controls>
						<TextArea editable="false" defaultValue="getTranslation(Apps_txtCode)" formatBind="Control1" styleClass="styField_DetailLabel"/>
						<TextArea code="txtCdPayment" dataBind="CdPayment" formatBind="Control2" styleClass="styField_DetailValue"/>
					</Controls>
				</Cell>
				<Cell format="Outer_1" code="cllPaymentStatus">
					<Controls>
						<TextArea editable="false" defaultValue="getTranslation(Apps_txtStatus)" formatBind="Control1" styleClass="styField_DetailLabel"/>
						<TextArea code="txtPaymentStatus" dataBind="StatusName" formatBind="Control2" styleClass="styField_DetailValue"/>
						<Image dataBind="StatusImage" formatBind="Image2"/>
					</Controls>
				</Cell>
				<Cell format="Outer_1" code="cllCreationDate">
					<Controls>
						<TextArea editable="false" defaultValue="getTranslation(Apps_txtPaymentDate)" formatBind="Control1" styleClass="styField_DetailLabel"/>
						<TextArea code="txtCreationDate" dataBind="DtPayment" formatBind="Control2" styleClass="styField_DetailValue"/>
					</Controls>
				</Cell>
				<Cell format="Outer_1" code="cllPaymentId" visible="false">
					<Controls>
						<Text code="txtPaymentId" editable="false" formatBind="Control2" dataBind="IdPayment"/>
					</Controls>
				</Cell>
			</Cells>
		</CellGroup>

      <CellList code="cllDebtSummary" visible="false">
		  <SelectCommand>
			  <FileSource code="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_DebtSummary_Sel" name="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_DebtSummary_Sel.sql"/>
		  </SelectCommand>
        <Header title="getTranslation(Apps_hdrPaymentDebtSummary)"/>
        <CellDef code="lstDebtSummary" cellIdField="Ind" format="Outer_1" onTap="onTapLstSummaryDebt">
          <Controls>
			<TextArea formatBind="Control1" dataBind="Title" styleClass="styField_DetailLabel"/>
            <Numeric code="numDebtSummary" formatBind="Control2" dataBind="ValueNumeric" defaultValue="0.00" decimalPlaces="2" styleClass="styField_DetailValue"/>
          </Controls>
        </CellDef>
      </CellList>

      <CellGroup code="clgTotalPayment">
          <Header title="getTranslation(Apps_hdrTotalPayment)"/>
          <Cells>
            <Cell format="Outer_1" code="cllTotalPayment">
              <Controls>
				  <TextArea editable="false" code="txtTotal" formatBind="Control1" styleClass="styField_DetailLabel"/>
                <Numeric editable="false" code="numTotal" formatBind="Control2" dataBind="VlPayment" defaultValue="0.00" maxValue="9999999999.999999" decimalPlaces="2" styleClass="styField_DetailValue"/>
              </Controls>
            </Cell>
          </Cells>
        </CellGroup>
        <CellGroup code="clgCashPayment">
          <Header title="getTranslation(Apps_hdrCashPayment)"/>
          <Cells>
            <Cell format="Outer_1" code="cllCashPayment">
              <Controls>
                <TextArea editable="false" code="txtCashPayment" formatBind="Control1" styleClass="styField_DetailLabel"/>
                <Numeric editable="true" defaultValue="0.00" autoCompleteDecimal="true" code="numCashPayment" formatBind="Control2" dataBind="VlCashAmount" maxValue="9999999999.999999" decimalPlaces="2" beforeLosingFocus="onLosingFocusCashPayment" onTap="onTapNumCashPayment" styleClass="styField_DetailValue" />
              </Controls>
            </Cell>
          </Cells>
        </CellGroup>

		<CellList code="cllOtherTitlePayment" editable="true"
			beforeAddCell="beforeAddCell"
			beforeDeleteCell="beforeDeleteCell">
			<SelectCommand>
				<FileSource code="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_TitleSel" name="ScreenPaymentsDetailHeader_TitleSel.sql"/>
			</SelectCommand>
			<Header title="getTranslation(Apps_hdrPaymentTitleOther)"/>
			<CellDef cellIdField="IdPaymentTitle" format="Outer_1" code="cllDefOtherTitles">
				<Controls>
					<TextArea code="txtTitleType" dataBind="PaymentTitleTypeCurrency" editable="false" formatBind="Control1" styleClass="styField_DetailLabel" />
					<Numeric code="numTitleValue" dataBind="PaymentTitleValueNumber" decimalPlaces="2" defaultValue="0.00" formatBind="Control2" styleClass="styField_DetailValue" />
					<ImageButton image="img_btn_view_details.png" formatBind="ImageButton1" onTap="onTapBtnOtherTitle"/>
				</Controls>
			</CellDef>
		</CellList>
	</ScreenComponents>
</Screen>
